entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:03 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
